p: The impurity groups we detected can cause different side effects. We identified reactive underfluorinated impurities and their degradation product (HF) as one reason for the toxic effect of Ala Â®octa batches. 3, 4 Notably, the individual risks of each type of impurity may be increased by interaction with other impurity groups, as that happens with the supporting effect of surface-modifying compounds during tissue transition.
